original_text: When the apostles in Jerusalem heard that Samaria had accepted the word of God, they sent Peter and John to Samaria.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 있는 사도들이 사마리아도 하나님의 말씀을 받았다 함을 듣고 베드로와 요한을 보내매

sentences.original_text: When the apostles in Jerusalem heard
that Samaria had accepted the word of God
they sent Peter and John to Samaria
